  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cosm.client.http.DefaultRequestHandler<T>

  • public class DefaultRequestHandler<T extends ConnectedObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler for building and making requests, uses DefaultResponseHandler to process the response
